modes.notes: Primary high-frequency urban network with integrated fares.
Comprehensive bus network including night buses.
Regional rail useful for airport and suburban destinations.
Serves key corridors outside central core.

payment_methods.details: Reloadable integrated transit card valid across metro, bus, tram, and regional rail zones.
Accepted for many tickets and top-ups at station machines.
Available via operator apps for selected products.

operating_hours.weekday: Metro generally runs 05:00-00:00 Monday-Thursday; extended Friday.
operating_hours.weekend: Saturday often runs overnight; Sunday until around midnight.
operating_hours.night_service: NitBus covers overnight gaps with key routes.

rideshare.notes: Available in the metro area, with varying wait times by district.
Strong local presence, often used for business travel.
Taxi-hailing app commonly used in central areas.

tips: For 2-5 day business trips, buy a T-casual or suitable T-mobilitat product on arrival, use Aerobus if your hotel is near Placa de Catalunya, and check late-night options in advance as modal coverage changes after midnight.
